Text.Page:
We've discovered what hold Killian has over us. If we don't do as Killian asks, he'll destroy our eggs!

Those hatchlings are the future of our people!

We need your help. My people may not deserve it, but our children are innocents in this. Hurry to Accipiter Watchpost and find Qrawkil!

I'll rend those wretches who threaten our young! To compel our obedience in this way is unforgiveable.

We're ready to risk everything to stop Killian. Will you help us?
